name: web-perf-toolkit
description: ESLint plugin for web performance optimization

scripts.test:eslint: npm run test:eslint:ts && npm run test:eslint:angular && npm run test:eslint:js
scripts.test:eslint:ts: cd test-apps/ts-sample && npm install && npm run lint
scripts.test:eslint:angular: cd test-apps/angular-sample && npm install && npm run lint
scripts.test:eslint:js: cd test-apps/js-sample && npm install && npm run lint
scripts.test:api: node -e "import('./packages/eslint-plugin-perf/dist/index.js').then(m => console.log('âœ… ESLint Plugin API loaded:', Object.keys(m)))"
scripts.test:integration: npm run build && npm run test:eslint && npm run test:api
scripts.test:all: npm run build && npm test && npm run test:integration
